text: Seven soft skills you need on your résuméIncluding examples of soft skills in your résumé is one of the most effective ways to stand out to employers, but which skills are most in demand?Shape what’s next in community serviceRMIT’s Graduate Certificate in Domestic and Family Violence will prepare you to pursue a rewarding career in the social science sector.
